snippet.title: Back to School Open Thread
snippet.description:
* Back to School Open Thread swarm my living room for old-fashioned parlor games and new-fangled board games. (My favorites are Telestrations, the […] always ask me to play, and genuinely seem to want my participation. Playing board games turns out to be one of the few […] really like teenagers, especially the teenagers my kids bring home. We live in a tight-knit community and my house is often
14 weeks ago
